title: Strengthening Practical AI Competencies: Cognitive Apprenticeship Model for Integrated Medical and Humanities Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design integrated medical and humanities lessons using the six stages (modeling, coaching, scaffolding, articulation, reflective practice, exploratory learning) of the cognitive apprenticeship model.
Learners can write project reports deriving educational insights by analyzing real clinical cases from a humanities perspective.
Learners can suggest three or more improvements for integrated instructional design through peer feedback and self-reflection.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
